title: [Large-Scale] TAM-Based Practitioner Competency Development Course for Enhancing E-Learning System Acceptance

context.prior_knowledge: Digital literacy and secondary-level social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Modular 5-10 minute content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, designed around practical application cases

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core elements of the Technology Acceptance Model (TAM)—perceived usefulness and ease of use—to practical cases.
Learners can analyze organizational and environmental factors that determine the acceptance of e-learning systems.
Learners can establish practical strategies to maximize learning effectiveness in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
